block.p: American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES - Traded OF B.J. Sunhoff and RHP Gabe Molina to Atlanta for OF Trenidad Hubbard, C Fermando lunar and RHP Luis Rivera. Traded 1B Will Clark and cash to St. Louis for 3B Jose Leon. DETROIT TIGERS - Released OF Luis Polonia. Recalled OF Billy McMillon from Toledo of the International League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS - Traded RHP Jay Witasick to San Diego for RHP Brian Meadows.

American League BALTIMORE ORIOLES - Traded OF B.J. Sunhoff and RHP Gabe Molina to Atlanta for OF Trenidad Hubbard, C Fermando lunar and RHP Luis Rivera. Traded 1B Will Clark and cash to St. Louis for 3B Jose Leon. DETROIT TIGERS - Released OF Luis Polonia. Recalled OF Billy McMillon from Toledo of the International League. KANSAS CITY ROYALS - Traded RHP Jay Witasick to San Diego for RHP Brian Meadows.

MINNESOTA TWINS - Traded 1B Mario Valdez to Oakland for C Danny Ardoin. SEATTLE MARINERS - Traded 1B-OF John Mabry and RHP Tom Davey to San Diego for OF Al Martin. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS - Traded RHP Steve Trachsel and LHP Mark Guthrie to Toronto for 2B Brent Abernathy and a player to be named. TORONTO BLUE JAYS - Traded RHP John Sneed to Philadelphia to complete an earlier trade for OF Rob Ducey.

National League CHICAGO CUBS - Traded OF Henry Rodriguez to Florida from 1B-OF Ross Gload and LHP Dave Noyce. Traded LHP Scott Downs to Montreal for OF Rondell White. Agreed to a one-year contract extension with Rondell White through 2001. HOUSTON ASTROS - Placed C Mitch Meluskey on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of C Raul Chavez from New Orleans of the PCL. LOS ANGELES DODGERS - Traded OF Todd Hollandsworth, OF Kevin Gibbs and LHP Randey Dorame to Colorado for OF Tom Goodwin and cash. PITTSBURGH PIRATES - Agreed to terms with OF-1B John Vander Wal on a two-year contract. ST. LOUIS CARDINALS - Traded RHP Heathcliff Slocumb and OF Ben Johnson to San Diego for C Carlos Hernandez and INF-OF Nate Tebbs.

National Basketball Association CLEVELAND CAVALIERS - Named Chris Tucker athletic trainer. Women's National Basketball Association DETROIT SHOCK - Activated F Oksana Zakaluzhnaya from the injured list. Activated G Tamicha Jackson from the injured list.

National Football League BUFFALO BILLS - Released PK Dan Giancola. CINCINNATI BENGALS - Released WR Ben Clampitt, DT Dave Fleischhauer and P Jeff Walker. DENVER BRONCOS - Announced the retirement of FB Anthony Lynn. DETROIT LIONS - Signed CB Sedrick Curry. Released LB Delaunta Cameron. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS - Released LB Jeff Brady. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS - Traded LB K.D. Williams to Green Bay for QB Aaron Brooks and TE Lamont Hall. Cut RB Dino Philyaw. JETS - Waived RB-KR Robert Farmer. TENNESSEE TITANS - Signed WR Carl Pickens to a five-year contract. Signed CB Ty Howard. Released WR Donald Sellers.

National Hockey League ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS - Agreed to terms with G. Jean-Sebastien Giguere on a one-year contract. ATLANTA THRASHERS - Agreed to terms with F Brian Wesenberg, D Brett Clark and G Scott Fankhouser. CALGARY FLAMES - Re-signed D Wade Belak. CAROLINA HURRICANES - Signed D Kevin Hatcher to a one-year contract. CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS - Signed D Nolan Baumgartner and G Rob Tallas. DALLAS STARS - Re-signed RW Jamie Langenbruner to a one-year contract. LOS ANGELES KINGS - Agreed to terms with D Aki Berg and G Marcel Cousineau on one-year contracts and F Brad Chartrand on a multiyear contract. NEW YORK RANGERS - Named Tom Renney player personnel director. PHOENIX COYOTES - Signed C Travis Green and C Daniel Briere to a one-year contracts. PITTSBURGH PENGUINS - Agreed to terms with F Matthew Barnaby and LW Rene Corbet. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING - Re-signed C Brian Holzinger and C Steve Martins to one-year contracts and RW Martin St Louis to a multiyear contract. TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS - Named Mike Penny director of player personnel. VANCOUVER CANUCKS - Named Bob Murray professional scout. WASHINGTON CAPITALS - Re-signed C Andrei Nikolishin to a one-year contract.
World Indoor Soccer League ST. LOUIS STEAMERS - Signed G Chris Smith and F Brad Jordan.

BROWN - Named Dean Mendes women's assistant basketball coach. BUCKNELL - Named Janelle Brenerman softball coach. CAL STATE-FULLERTON - Named John Bartlesson women's assistant basketball coach. CLEMSON - Announced the resignation of Anthony Solomon, men's assistant basketball coach, to take the same position at Notre Dame. COLORADO - Announced the NCAA has ruled basketball recruit Jaime Lloreda ineligible to play during the upcoming season. DRAKE - Named Natasha Brown women's tracka nd field coach. DUKE - Named Elliot Bloom assistant sports information director and Chris Mitchell sports information staff assistant. FLORIDA ATLANTIC - Named Mark Sander assistant football coach and Fred O'Connor wide receiver coach. FURMAN - Named Ryan Higginbotham men's assistant soccer coach. GEORGIA - Suspended RB Kenny Bailey, OT Richard Seymour, TE Robert Brannon, CB Decory Bryant, LB Kendrell Bell, LB Tony Gilbert and LB Charles Frant for one game each for using a school long-distance code to make personal phone calls. IONA - Named Patrick Lyons assistant athletic director for compliance. JAMES MADISON - Named Rebecca Grefe director of marketing. JOHNSON STATE - Named James Roy men's and women's cross-country coach. LAFAYETTE - Announced the resignation of Jill Redfern, women's lacrosse coach. LONGWOOD - Named Jennifer Fichera assistant trainer. MCNEESE STATE - Named David Dumars men's assistant basketball coach. r men's basketball coach. RUTGERS - Announced the resignation of Tod Kowalczyk, men's assistant basketball coach, to take the same position at Marquette.
